name: red back
desc: A small red spider with a red marking on its back. It like to live in a messy web in a warm, sheltered location
venom: The bite feels like a pinprick, but the venom is painful and potentially fatal. Only a small amount of venom can cause serious illness, as the poison attacks the nervous system. Systemic envenomisation usually results in headache, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, pyrexia, hypertension and in severe cases, paralysis.
bitten: Call 000. Antivenom exists. Apply an icepack or a cold compression to the bite area while waiting. DO NOT use the Pressure Immobilisation Technique.
